title: Desert Rains
description: In the first book of the Tales of Balia Christian fantasy series, ancient Alagor suffers a severe drought, and an unlikely alliance between slaves, beggars, and nobles might be the only hope for this dying town trapped in the grip of the vicious cult of Longsuffering God. But TrueGod, the real deity of Balia, wants more than the city freed; he also means to heal the broken lives of his unsuspecting little army.
author: Jill Penrod
